results.title: Hayley's home movie
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Michael Scott, John Spotton and Gail Singer
results.brief_description: Part of the Finding Our Way series, which deals with contemporary family-life issues, this is the story of twelve-year-old Hayley, who must acknowledge the finality of parental separation when her father’s new girlfriend abruptly enters her life. All the issues surrounding separation are realistically evoked. Hayley’s anger, and her fantasy about her parents reuniting, are the central focus. But Hayley’s personality is irrepressible; she finds strength in her own imagination and creativity, thus effecting the beginnings of a resolution.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Michael Scott, John Spotton and Gail Singer

results.title: Hayes Jones
results.creator_credit: Allegro Film Productions, Daniel Ruffini, Hugh King and Jerry Forman
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of New York’s new Commissioner of Recreation, a newly created post. Hayes Jones, former Olympic high hurdler, administers 900 parks, is activity director for eight million people and supervisor of 12,000 employees. We follow him through a typical working day.

results.title: Hayburners
results.creator_credit: Multi Media Productions and Tom Robertson
results.brief_description: Young Will Bennett has been assigned a steer to raise and to groom for a 4H club contest, but he is sadly disappointed in the “Hayburner” he has ended up with. A middle-aged retarded helper named Joe enters the scene and sees promise in the animal. Together Will and Joe work to win with Mickey. Based on the novel by Gene Smith.

results.title: Hawks and sparrows = Uccellacci e uccellini [Widescreen]
results.brief_description: In Pasolini’s picaresque serio-comic fable-essay-confession on the theme of social justice, a father and son set out to emulate St. Francis of Assissi’s mission to convert the birds to Christianity. Wandering the Italian landscape, they encounter a wise talking crow, who follows them along retelling left wing parables. Cast includes Toto and Ninetto Davoli. Musical score by Ennio Morricone.

results.title: Hawks & doves
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Brian Rapsey
results.brief_description: A sailor abandons his military duties and tries to hide himself from the national coverage of his desertion, and the war escalating in the Gulf. He finds comfort with his Uncle who served in Vietnam, but clashes with his father who did not go to war. Cast includes Andrew Mayne, Dorothy Blayney and Phillip Motherwell.

results.title: Hawkins' rivers
results.creator_credit: Eyelevel Production, TAS Television Productions and Robert Heazlewood
results.brief_description: Leo McKern narrates this modern day adventure set in twentieth century Tasmania. The true story concerns Tasmanian doctor and canoeist John Hawkins, who led the fight to save the Franklin River. It was, and still is a dilemma between developing the natural resources of the land or to forgo development at the price of suffering potential economic, political and social consequences. It is an issue that commanded the rest of the nation’s attention and continues to be pertinent today.

results.title: Hawaiian hospitality
results.creator_credit: Matson Hotels and Pan American World Airways
results.brief_description: Describes the facilities provided by the Matson hotels in Hawaii for the comfort and pleasure of holiday makers. All the thrills of surf-riding and surf skiing are portrayed. Glimpses of the informal buffet dinners provided by the Royal Hawaiian Hotel; islanders performing native dances before the guests and a mannequin parade on the terrace. Follows the tourists as they visit neighbouring islands.

results.title: Hawaii: the possible dream
results.creator_credit: Cate and McGlone Films and E McGlone
results.brief_description: A tourist eye-view of the islands comprising the Hawaiian chain. Beginning with the famed Waikiki Beach at Honolulu, on the island of Oahu, the varied tourist attractions are visited on Kauai - the Garden Island, Maui - the Valley Island and Hawaii - the Orchid Island, also famed for its extinct and erupting volcanoes.
